text: There is no question with regards to your leadership, but there are aspects of government and administration outside of your awareness.
Your awareness of government and administration within your realm is weak, and many have started to question your leadership as a consequence.
Your influence in the realm is all-encompassing and you are at the centre of every administrative or governmental activity in your realm.
Nobody is questioning your influence within your administration; nor would anyone want to.
If a clerk within your realm releases a govenrment decree, there is a good chance you were involved.

[[b]]Influence[[/b]] is this faction's unique resource.\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]]Influence represents how much authority and control this faction leader has within his own government and within the administration of his faction.[[/col]][[/i]]
